about: Data Scientist and Software Engineer with a strong focus on real-world problem solving. My background includes building machine learning models, optimizing algorithms, and creating user-focused applicationsâ€”from predictive analytics to LLM-based tools.

projects.title: A/B Test Simulation: Ad vs PSA Impact on Conversion
projects.description: This project simulates a real-world A/B test to determine whether showing product advertisements leads to higher user conversion compared to public service announcements (PSAs).

projects.title: User Behavior Analysis in a Music Streaming App
projects.description: This project analyses the listening patterns and behaviours of users in a music streaming app, focusing on identifying factors that distinguish churned users from upgraded users. The dataset initially consisted of over 26 million records.

projects.title: Interview Selection Analysis
projects.description: This project analyses interview selection factors based on real evaluation data. We explore what influences selection and rejection decisions, providing insights to help candidates prepare effectively.

projects.title: Analyzing the Effect of Weather and Income on IQ Across Countries
projects.description: In this project, we aim to explore how weather (temperature) and average income influence the IQ levels of countries worldwide. By analysing data from various countries, we used regression models to understand the relationships between these factors.

projects.title: Predicting House Prices with Machine Learning
projects.description: This project involves building a machine learning model to predict house prices based on various features. We explore different regression techniques and evaluate their performance.

projects.title: Extracting and Visualizing Stock Data
projects.description: This project involves extracting historical stock data and visualizing trends in the stock market. The goal is to analyse stock price fluctuations, identify patterns, and create insightful visualizations to assist with financial decision-making.

projects.title: SpaceX Falcon-9 Success Landing Prediction
projects.description: This project aims to predict the success of SpaceX Falcon-9 rocket landings using historical launch data. We apply machine learning techniques to classify landing outcomes based on various features.
technologies: Classification Algorithms (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, SVM)

projects.title: Bus Tracking Native Android App
projects.description: This project involves developing a native Android application for tracking buses in real-time. The app provides users with live bus locations, estimated arrival times, and route information.

projects.title: TSP Optimization Benchmark with GUI
projects.description: This project benchmarks the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using three powerful metaheuristic algorithms: Discrete Spider Monkey Optimization (DSMO),Ant Colony Optimization (ACO), Genetic Algorithm (GA).The application features an intuitive PyQt5 graphical interface that automatically runs all three algorithms on the given dataset and compares their performance.

projects.title: Healthcare Translation Web App with Generative AI
projects.description: A real-time multilingual translation app for healthcare settings, enabling communication between patients and providers through speech-to-text, translation, and audio playback.

projects.title: Rain Prediction in Australia
projects.description: This project predicts rainfall in Australia using historical weather data. We apply machine learning techniques to classify whether it will rain based on various meteorological features.
technologies: Classification Algorithms (Logistic Regression, Random Forest, SVM)
